metadata.inclusion:
1. Initiate inclusion on your Z Wave controller. The distance between sensor and controller is suggested to be less than 1 meter.
2. Press the program switch of the ZG8101 for at least 1 second.
3. The LED on the ZG8101 should go solid, if not, please try again.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Initiate exclusion on your Z Wave controller.
2. Press the program switch of ZG8101 for 1 second at least to be excluded.
